data.title: Everything We Know About the Splinter Cell Remake
data.meta_description: Ubisoft is revisiting the iconic stealth-shooter series, Splinter Cell, with a full-blown remake of the original game. Here's what we know about the upcoming Splinter Cell Remake, including its release date, updated story, and cutting-edge visuals.
data.text:
Ubisoft is revisiting the iconic stealth-shooter series, Splinter Cell, with a full-blown remake of the original game that set the standard for third-person stealth action. The announcement has sparked anticipation among fans, as they await the return of Sam Fisher, the legendary black ops agent. Here's a comprehensive rundown of what we know about the upcoming Splinter Cell Remake.

After an eight-year hiatus since the release of Splinter Cell: Blacklist, Ubisoft is diving back into the shadows with a full-blown remake of the original 2002 Splinter Cell game. Developed by Ubisoft Toronto, this remake is poised to capture the essence of the early games while delivering a fresh experience for both nostalgic fans and newcomers.

Modern Graphics and Gameplay

Ubisoft is sparing no effort to elevate the visuals of the Splinter Cell Remake. The game is being built from the ground up using the Snowdrop engine, known for its photorealistic capabilities. The focus on "new-generation visuals and gameplay" promises to bring the world of Splinter Cell to life like never before. Fans can expect highly detailed and photorealistic character models and textures, enhancing the iconic light and shadow mechanics that defined the original series.

A Reimagined Story

While the core of the original story will remain intact, Ubisoft is modernizing and updating the narrative for a contemporary audience. The first Splinter Cell's foundation will be used as a springboard, allowing Ubisoft to delve deeper into character development and explore a more authentic and believable world. Expect familiar themes and the spirit of the early games to be preserved, while new story elements may add intrigue and depth to Sam Fisher's espionage adventure.

Release Date and Platforms

Ubisoft has confirmed the Splinter Cell Remake is in the works, but a specific release date remains elusive. Given the project's early stages of development, it's likely that eager fans won't see the game until at least 2024. The remake is set to launch on modern platforms, including the PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
